High boundary of Jewish Calendar is Elul 5860
Low boundary of Gregorian Calendar is January 1900
High boundary of Gregorian Calendar is December 2100
From must be earlier than To
Note: The time range of this event overlaps time range of another event
Note: All events occurring during this day will be removed

Ensure that either GPS or wireless networks are enabled."

When this mode is turned on, all communications and transmitions will be disabled or restricted during the Shabbat.

"Device will be forced back to sleep if mistakenly woken up by pressing the power button. In case of an emergency wake the device up 3 times."

"Airplane mode will block all transmissions to your device. Keep in Silent mode will keep the device silent while incoming calls and SMS will be received and recorded on device logs. It will ring only for incoming calls from people on your allowed list."
The application will automatically search and update your current location and the Shabbat times.
Press the button to find your current location
In order to determine the Shabbat accurate times according to your exact location, please turn on location services.
Shomer Shabbat will start on the next Shabbat entrance time
Keeping Shomer Shabbat. Device will lock in a few seconds
Your device will enter Shomer Shabbat in
In case of an emergency, wake the device up 3 times.
Shabbat entrance is candle lighting time, 18 minutes before sunset.
Do not disturb is enabled. Tap SETTINGS to disable Do not disturb to allow calls and messages during Shabbat.

"When this mode is enabled, the device will automatically enter “Shabbat Mode” on the next Sabbath entrance, and will exit it on Sabbath end.
Network connectivity (WIFI and cellular data) and Bluetooth will be disabled.

The times calculations are done according to the device's location with the following guidelines:
● Shabbat entrance – candles lighting time, 18 minutes before sunset.
● Shabbat exit – sunset time on Saturday.

Locations and times
The app will find the device location and calculate the Shabbat times accordingly.
● For best location search results, Google Location Services has to be on.
● Automatically update location – search and update the location on Friday, on set times before the Sabbath, after reboot and with every time or date settings' change.
● Set location manually – All calculations of the Shabbat times will be according to the last location found, the chosen city or the device's time zone.

Features
● Prevent use in Shabbat – If the device screen will light up (either by pressing a button or by any other reason) it will go back to sleep immediately. In case of an emergency or in order to exit Shabbat Mode, wake the device up 3 consecutive times.
● Power saving – enable power saving mode to save battery during the Sabbath.
● Turn off alarm ant timer – alarms set to the Sabbath will not go off.
● Turn off LED indicator – during the Sabbath the LED indicator will not light up when charging, voice recording or receiving notifications.

Device connectivity mode
Choose one of the following options:
● Airplane mode on – the device will be in Airplane mode. Disables calling and messaging functions, and turns off Mobile data.
● Keep phone in sleep mode – the device will accept calls and texts messages during the Sabbath, but will stay silent. All other network connections will be disabled. The exceptions will be only calls and texts from contacts in the allowed contacts list.

Allowed contacts list
● Allow calls and texts from specific contacts.
"

"When this mode is enabled, the device will automatically enter “Shabbat Mode” on the next Sabbath entrance, and will exit it on the Sabbath end.

The times calculations are done according to the device's location with the following guidelines:
● Sabbath entrance – candles lighting time, 18 minutes before sunset.
● Sabbath exit – sunset time on Saturday.

Locations and times
The app will find the device location and calculate the Sabbath times accordingly.
● For best location search results, Google Location Services has to be on.
● Automatically update location – search and update the location on Friday, on set times before the Sabbath, after reboot and with every time or date settings' change.
● Set location manually – All calculations of the Sabbath times will be according to the last location found, the chosen city or the device's time zone.

Features
● Prevent use in Shabbat - If the device screen will light up (either by pressing a button or by any other reason) it will go back to sleep immediately. In case of an emergency or in order to exit Shabbat Mode, wake the device up 3 consecutive times.
● Turn off alarm and timer – alarms set to the Sabbath will not go off.
● Turn off LED indicator – during the Sabbath the LED indicator will not light up when charging, voice recording or receiving notifications.

Allowed contacts list
● Keep phone in sleep mode - the device will accept calls and texts messages during the Sabbath, but will stay silent. Notifications will be received only for calls from contacts in the allowed contacts list.
● Allow calls and texts from specific contacts.
"

"When this mode is enabled, the device will automatically enter Shabbat Mode on the next Shabbat entrance, and will exit it on Motzai Shabbat.
For more information please move to the Shomer Shabbat settings: Menu - Go to Shomer Shabbat"
This app needs Device Administration rights to put the device to sleep on Shabbat.
